abstract: Jenson Button, the 2009 world champion, has signed up to continue racing at McLaren Mercedes, though it was not clear for how long.
snippet: Jenson Button, the 2009 world champion, has signed up to continue racing at McLaren Mercedes, though it was not clear for how long.
lead_paragraph: NAGOYA, Japan - As the Formula One circus travels to Japan for the Japanese Grand Prix this coming weekend, the McLaren Mercedes team has announced that Jenson Button has signed a new multi-year contract with the team.

headline.main: Button Signs Multiple-Year Contract at McLaren Mercedes
